fullText: This gender-flipped revival of Stephen Sondheim's 1970 musical, starring Katrina Lenk as Bobbie, brings fresh perspective to the material while honoring its essential spirit.
dtliExcerpt: This gender-flipped revival of Stephen Sondheim's 1970 musical, starring Katrina Lenk as Bobbie, brings fresh perspective to the material while honoring its essential spirit.
